name: Just One Pistol
description:
DEVLOG COMING HERE WITHIN THE NEXT COUPLE DAYS

GITHUB REPO

JUST ONE PISTOL is an epic 2D in 3D (like Doom) arena shooter survival game.

THIS GAME was made and submitted for the 7DFPS jam

I TOTALLY didn't just make one weapon because I was lazy

THERE ARE 4 monsters and 3 types of powerups, controls and such can be found in the HELP menu of the game

THE GAME WAS inspired by Doom with it's 2D sprites in 3D

I DID all of the programming, music, art, and made the sounds with BFXR
